pageContext.claim: “Nucor, you see what they're doing. They're building brand-new beautiful plants. And I saw plans of one of them. They're so proud of them.”
pageContext.analysis: In March, Nucor Corp. said it plans to spend $240 million to build a construction rebar mill in Florida, the second such facility the Charlotte-based steel manufacturer has announced in the last five months. But the company has been on an expansion plan for two years, before Trump's tariffs.
